channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0827; 02:30PM; 5801 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi</a>; #MidWilshire; Eight (male and female) teenage students from an unidentified school, were on a field trip to the La Brea Tar Pits , when they were discovered acutely ill by an on-site Security Officer, who called 9-1-1. LAFD Paramedics arrived quickly to determine each had an altered level of consciousness, following their reported ingestion of cannabis edibles. In fair condition, all were taken by ambulance to area hospitals for further medical assessment. LAPD Incident #2397. ; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; AP65 BC18 E261 E61 EM11 RA26 RA29 RA3 RA34 RA35 RA46 RA71 RA76 RA92 RA97 T61; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Medical; INC#0827; 12:45PM; 5801 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3ykQRMi</a>; #MidWilshire; PRELIM: As many as eight young persons (teens? unknown personal or site affiliation) with altered level of consciousness after apparent contact with or ingestion of a yet to be identified product or substance. Per protocol, all will be taken by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in undetermined condition. No further details.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; AP65 BC18 E261 E61 EM11 RA26 RA29 RA34 RA35 RA76 RA92 T61; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0590; 10:45AM; 320 S Soto St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bAVi3Q" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bAVi3Q</a>; #BoyleHeights; *Address Corrected* 35 LAFD Firefighters took just 13 minutes in defensive firefighting operations, to extinguish an abandoned and unoccupied 1,450 square foot one-story former restaurant - the site of a previous fire, that was fully involved on their arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E2 E202 E209 E25 E4 RA2 RA25 SO1 SQ21 T2 T9; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0590; 10:32AM; 2334 E 4th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4akm4fM" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4akm4fM</a>; #BoyleHeights; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Defensive firefight at a fully involved, abandoned and apparently vacant detached one-story commercial building (former restaurant), the site of a previous fire.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E2 E202 E25 E4 RA2 RA25 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Cliff Rescue; INC#0792; 12:38PM; 753 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wnC1nQ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wnC1nQ</a>; #SanPedro; Firefighters responded to reports of a person at the bottom of the cliffs near Point Fermin. LAFD arrived by air, land, and sea to find someone deceased at the bottom. Crews will provide assistance to law enforcement and the Medical Examiner in recovering the body. No additional patients. No details regarding the circumstances surrounding the death. The scene is under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E238 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA101 RH114 T38 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0534; 10:22AM; 5460 E Nordyke St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3WI90hr" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3WI90hr</a>; #EagleRock; Firefighter found an ascending hillside home with heavy smoke showing. Crews deployed hose lines into the structure and found a well-developed attic fire. It took 30 firefighters 25 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. The cause is under investigation.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E1 E201 E235 E250 E42 E44 E55 EM1 RA56 RA850 T1 T35 T50; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Train vs Vehicle; INC#0541; 10:01AM; 901 W Exposition Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3yiQdir" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3yiQdir</a>; #UniversityPark; Initial reports suggested a train vs pedestrian. Firefighters arrived to find no pedestrian involved, but one vehicle was struck by a train (with 5 passengers in the vehicle and several dozen passengers on the train). Crews are performing medical assessments on the five vehicle occupants, all with only minor injuries (and none currently requesting hospital transport). No reported injuries from any of the train passengers. LAPD Inc #1680. No further updates anticipated.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 BC6 E14 E15 E211 E215 E233 E46 EM11 HR3 RA15 RA815 SQ21 T11 T33; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0534; 09:57AM; 5460 E Nordyke St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3WI90hr" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3WI90hr</a>; #EagleRock; Two-story home with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E250 E42 E55 RA56 RA850 T1 T50; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Tree Fire; INC#1542; 07:53PM; 6700 W Hillpark Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3WyAFkA" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3WyAFkA</a>; #HollywoodHills; Crews on the ground declared a knockdown on the initial dumpster fire, as well as the palm trees on fire. Blue flames were initially observed in the dumpster, later determined to be caused by electrical wire and conduit. LAFD HazMat experts state there is no further threat to the surrounding area.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E76 E86 SQ21; CH7; 14; Lyndsey Lantz

Hiker Rescue; INC#1491; 07:20PM; 2469 N Solar Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bxAKt2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bxAKt2</a>; #HollywoodHillsWest; A 35yo male hiker sustained injuries secondary to a 15-foot fall in a remote area of Runyon Canyon. Crews on the ground and in the air coordinated to locate and assist the patient, who was able to walk down the trail and meet an LAFD paramedic ambulance for treatment and transport to a local hospital; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E41 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA41 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Lyndsey Lantz
